text: The student will identify and use the following in works of art:
subject: Visual Art

text: The student will identify and apply spatial relationships for composition.
subject: Visual Art
subs: Arrange shapes in space within the picture plane.

text: The student will create observational drawings of people and objects in the environment.
subject: Visual Art

text: The student will apply motor skills (e.g., cutting, modeling, molding, tearing, weaving) to create two- and three-dimensional works of art.
subject: Visual Art

text: The student will apply a variety of media, materials, techniques, and processes to create artwork.
subject: Visual Art

text: The student will create works of art inspired by a variety of sources and subjects.
subject: Visual Art
subs: Use the senses of sight, touch, and hearing.
Create works of art inspired by stories or poems, ideas, and themes.
